ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] White Dragons
ygData.msgSnippet: Heiro s are only 30-35k, and as Jeff said they are better than the white dragonscale.  but, what is important for Gore is levels, MR/CR, lots of people, and
ygData.messageBody:
Heiro's are only 30-35k, and as Jeff said they are better than the white
dragonscale. but, what is important for Gore is levels, MR/CR, lots of
people, and lots of wizards to nuke and enchanters to sieve. just treat her
like a buffed-up Vox. while tons of melee own all the other mobs, casters
own Gore cause of her AE Slow breath. we have a lot harder time with Gore
(which we don't ever bother with really) than we do a lot of easier mobs
cause our guild is mostly melee.

Shada

> Oh, I'm off by 3 zeroes. 50-75kpp I meant.
>
> Kenross Cantoforjado, 56 songs, Innoruuk
